headline: Realtor.com® Debuts Spotlight Listings to Help Agents Maximize Listing Visibility and Close More Sales
summary: Realtor.com® has launched Spotlight Listings, a new premium listing solution designed to capture more attention as buyers gain leverage and listing agents and sellers look for greater visibility for their home. The company also rolled out enhanced features for its Local Expert℠ marketing product, providing agents with more ways to strengthen their personal brand, demonstrate expertise, and connect with high-intent buyers and sellers on Realtor.com®.

content.title: Realtor.com® Debuts Spotlight Listings to Help Agents Maximize Listing Visibility and Close More Sales
content.summary: Realtor.com® has launched Spotlight Listings, a new premium listing solution designed to capture more attention as buyers gain leverage and listing agents and sellers look for greater visibility for their home. The company also rolled out enhanced features for its Local Expert℠ marketing product, providing agents with more ways to strengthen their personal brand, demonstrate expertise, and connect with high-intent buyers and sellers on Realtor.com®.

thumbnail.caption: With SpotLight Listings, listing agents can attract serious buyers with premium listing placement, bold design, and enhanced branding on the #1 site real estate professionals trust.
